meta.title: WalkScape | Support Us
meta.description: Subscribe to us on Patreon or Buy Me a Coffee to support development of WalkScape

body.section-1: You can support WalkScape's development via Patreon or Buy me a Coffee. Supporters of the game gain some exclusive benefits that are listed on Patreon and Buy me a Coffee.
body.section-2: WalkScape is completely community funded, and all of the support is very much appreaciated. ❤️
